This documentation provides a series of tutorials for Mapineq Link which includes the following components:  
- [Mapineq Link homepage](https://mapineq.org)  
- [Interactive dashboard](https://dashboard.mapineq.org)  
- [Data catalogue](https://dashboard.mapineq.org/datacatalogue)  
- [Mapineq API](https://api.mapineq.org)  
- PostgreSQL Database  
- [MapIneq GitHub](https://github.com/OxfordDemSci/MapIneq)  (soon to be public)

If you would like to request additional documentation, please open an issue in the GitHub repository with your request.

## Tutorials

### Mapineq API

The Mapineq API allows you to query the database to retrieve data dynamically for your own website or to import directly into your local progamming environments (e.g. R, Python) for data analysis.

- [API tutorial for R](./api_tutorial_R)  
- [API tutorial for Python](./api_tutorial_python)
- [API technical documentation](./api_technical_doc)
